name: Lenny: Snuzzlepuff Trouble
description:
Welcome to Lenny: Snuzzlepuff Trouble, a top-down 2-D shooter debuting a mage that has no control over his magic powers! Defeat the Snuzzlepuff horde with whatever spells you are dealt with while trying not to harm your fellow mages.

Game was made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam featuring the theme Out of Control. Lenny: Snuzzlepuff Trouble follows the theme by having a protagonist that has no control over when or what magic he can use. Also the main enemy, Snuzzlepuffs, quickly grow out of control if not dealt with in the right fashion.

This is my first actual game I have submitted online (besides a couple very tiny game maker games I made many years ago when I was 13). It was a lot of fun to make! Hope you enjoy!

You can press N key to skip levels...

Game Developed by Me! (SwornCoyote)
Made with Game Maker Studio 2
Graphics - also by me...
Music - Antti Luode
Sound - Chiptone by SFBGames
